roleset.name: (cause to) become black in color
roleset.note: BLACKEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'blacken' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from blacken.01-v predicate notes)
BLACKENED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from blackened.01-j)

role.descr: thing that is black in color

example.name: blacken-v: passive
example.text: Although Exxon spent heavily during the latest quarter [*-2] to clean up [the Alaskan shoreline]*-2 blackened [*-2] by its huge oil spill , those expenses as well as the cost of a continuing spill-related program are covered [*-1] by $ 880 million [*U*] in charges taken [*] during the first half .

example.name: blackened-j
example.text: That I got because it was already blackened and gross . Albeit you probably did pay for it :-RRB-

roleset.name: fall asleep, faint
roleset.note: BLACK_OUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'black out' based on sentences in wsj. VerbNet 40.8.4, Framenet entry Fall asleep for black_out.01. (from black.01-v)

example.name: black_out-v: poor John
example.text: John blacked out before Mary could hit him more than three or four times.
example.arg: before Mary could hit him more than three or four times

example.name: black_out-v: misparsed passive
example.text: In this way, while the Stick itself was blacked out, we kept up to date on events.

roleset.name: black in color
roleset.note: BLACK-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet, blacken.01. (from black.01-j)

role.descr: thing that is black in color
specific part of arg1, if also mentioned

example.name: black-j: args 1,2
example.text: The instructions were clear, if the child was black of hair, if it looked like him it was to be smothered and taken away before Robert could see it.

example.name: black-j: argMs
example.text: Outside the earth's atmosphere, the sky is black day and night.

example.name: black-j: args 0,1
example.text: The wall was black from the constant stoking of the fire during the winter months.
example.arg: from the constant stoking of the fire during the winter months

roleset.name: of an ethnic background featuring dark skin
roleset.note: BLACK-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, WordNet. (from black.02-j)

example.name: black-j: the arg
example.text: By the 20th century, theories had also been proposed that Jesus was black

example.name: black-j: another
example.text: Incidentally ; if you 're white , female , black , communist , jewish , whatever ; you can still not get married if you 're gay .

roleset.name: morbid, depressive, evil, macabre, dark
roleset.note: BLACK-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from black.03-j)

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is dark

example.name: black-j: arg1
example.text: The humor was black and so is death, the narrator almost seemed to be annoyed with dying, like he does it every other day.

example.name: black-j: both args
example.text: It was black of humor and quite perverse, containing a substantial bit of nudity and death

example.name: black-j: both args
example.text: The vampire was black of heart, lacking of soul and humanity.

roleset.name: illegal
roleset.note: BLACK-J NOTES: Roleset added for AMR coverage. (from black.04-j)

example.name: black-j: Black market
example.text: They were selling TVs on the black market.
